name: Slash Chord: The Arrival
description:
Slash Chord: The Arrival is the prequel to Slash Chord: Jam Version. The Eerworms, an alien hive-mind from the deepest reaches of the galaxy, has found a new planet to assimilate! The trip will be very long however. Will they reach their destination?

...well yes, if the first game's to be believed.

The Ice Giants by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5745-the-ice-giants
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

For no reason in particular, here's a tutorial on making a clone of a certain game in Fusion 2.5
